abstract: Robert P. Kelly, chief executive of Bank of New York Mellon, told his senior managers on Thursday that he was not interested in taking the top job at Bank of America, defusing speculation that he would leave his current post.
snippet: Robert P. Kelly, chief executive of Bank of New York Mellon, told his senior managers on Thursday that he was not interested in taking the top job at Bank of America, defusing speculation that he would leave his current post.
lead_paragraph: Robert P. Kelly, chief executive of Bank of New York Mellon, told his senior managers on Thursday that he was not interested in taking the top job at Bank of America, defusing speculation that he would leave his current post.

headline.main: Bank of New York Chief Shuns BofA’s Top Job
